title: Bug 136074Filter editor needs to support column binding
description: Bug 136074Filter editor needs to support column binding
OB: In the Fitler tab of property editor for table/chart, Expression only shows dataset column, rather than column binding.Since column binding is supported for filter of table/chart, this is supposed to show the column binding.
EB: In the Fitler tab of property editor for table/chart, Expression only shows dataset column, rather than column binding.Since column binding is supported for filter of table/chart, this is supposed to show the column binding.
